Articles.Content:
Hi all, I've been playing KSP for about a week now and I thought I'd better join the forum having spent a bit of time here, looking at some of the advice and builds people have. I'm currently working on a manned mission to Duna, with a lander/crew section already in orbit around Kerbin and a plan to dock a drive/fuel section... just as soon as I can get that into orbit without it detonating on the pad. Other than that, my progress so far has been a manned lander (and return) for the Mun and a three-part station over Kerbin.

Just in case anyone's interested, I'm on Steam under 'Korlis' there too.

Welcome to the forums!

Good luck on your adventures, and if you have any questions, this forum is welcoming and as helpful as any on the internet.

Also, "Arrr, Happy Launching!"

you stole cap't skunkys catch phrase, he's going to hate upon you!!!

welcome to the forums korlis!

Korlis,

You should make a duna station with dedicated reusable lander to take kerbals to the surface base and back to the station with ease! That way, your trips there won't have to include the whole lander assembly each time.
